name: Comparators.js
description: Provides chainable comparator-function generators a la Java 8 Comparators

scripts.minify:
uglifyjs comparators.js -m -r 'require,module,exports,define,amd,comparing,thenComparing' -o comparators.min.js --preamble='/* Comparators.js 1.0.0
 * http://spencerwi.github.io/Comparators.js
 * (c) 2014 Spencer Williams
 * Comparators.js may be freely distributed under the MIT license. */'

author: Spencer Williams
